Sentencas: Small-scale solar PV-water electrolyzer systems are suggested for remote combined heat and power (CHP) applications.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: A residential solar PV-electrolyzer system is developed and coupled with a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system (PV-FC) for supplying the electricity demand.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: It is possible for the PV system to generate electricity in excess of the demand during off-peak hours.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The surplus electricity is used by the water electrolyzer for hydrogen production.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The hydrogen produced is stored in a storage tank.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The fuel cell is fed with the hydrogen generated by the electrolyzer.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The PV-FC system is coupled with a heat recovery unit, which provides the residential area with thermal energy, to improve energy utilization.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The heat recovery unit consists of a heat recovery steam generator and an absorption chiller utilizing the thermal energy of the SOFC flue gas for heating and cooling purposes.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: Determining system operational parameters is important for the design and implementation of the CHP system in a residential area.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: Therefore, the residential CHP system is assessed here based on energy and exergy.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The hourly demand of the residential area is taken into consideration for component selection and sizing, and energy and exergy efficiencies of the developed system are presented.
Titulo: Hybrid solar-fuel cell combined heat and power systems for residential applications: Energy and exergy analyses
